H0.text: Which English football league club play their home games at Gigg Lane. Bolton Wanderers

H1.text: Which English football league club play their home games at Gigg Lane. Manchester City

H2.text: Which English football league club play their home games at Gigg Lane. Rochdale

H3.text: Which English football league club play their home games at Gigg Lane. Bury

A4.text: Bury have played at Gigg Lane since 1885 when they rented the plot from the Earl of Derby's estate soon after the club's foundation.
